580a8334963709e728ed677c815fb7fef9bca70e.commitMessage: HADOOP-13483. Optimize IPC server protobuf decoding. Contributed by Daryn Sharp.
580a8334963709e728ed677c815fb7fef9bca70e.actualSource:
<T> T readFrom(ByteBuffer bb) throws IOException {
      // effectively consume the rest of the buffer from the callers
      // perspective.
      this.bb = bb.slice();
      bb.limit(bb.position());
      return (T)this;
    }
